channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Foo Fighters Tease Tour in AI-Assisted Promo Video: ‘There’s More To Come’
item.description: 🎸 Rock on! @foofighters hint at upcoming tour in cutting-edge AI promo. Who's ready to rock out? 🤘 #FooFighters #MusicNews

item.title: Justin Bieber Scores Seven-Figure Coachella Payday: ‘He’s Fully in the Driver’s Seat’
item.description: Justin Bieber is cashing in at Coachella 💸🎤 Who's ready for his epic performance? 🌟 #Coachella #JustinBieber

item.title: Macaulay Culkin Announces Home Alone 35th Anniversary Tour
item.description: Guess who's hitting the road? 🏠🎵 Macaulay Culkin celebrates 35 years of Home Alone with a special tour! Get ready to feel the nostalgia! 🙌 #HomeAlone35 #MusicNews

item.title: Avril Lavigne Announces Debut Wine
item.description: 🍷 Pop-punk princess Avril Lavigne is trading in her mic for a glass with debut wine announcement! Cheers to that! 🎸 #AvrilLavigne #WineTime

item.title: Sabrina Carpenter Predicted Her Coachella Headlining Slot Last Year: ‘Woman of My Word’
item.description: Sabrina Carpenter: From Prediction to Coachella Headliner 🎤✨ Who else is feeling those manifesting vibes? #CoachellaDreams
